storyInfo: As Christmas approaches, Ceylon runs into her classmate Rinz at the shopping district. Ceylon invites Rinz to help pick out presents, but seems oblivious to the awkwardness Rinz feels.

attributes.content: 'A few months ago, when I first entered university, I sent you a postcard of the National University Library.'
'I was ever so excited when I gazed upon the rows and rows of bookshelves rising to the ceiling, and when I listened to the footsteps of my classmates echo through that great building.'
'I thought there was no limit to knowledge held here, and that I could find the answer that I sought—the cure to your disease.'
'But when I stand in the same place today, I find myself in a daze. Each and every step needed to reach the bookshelves has become an arduous trek.'

'I've become afraid of the library, of the laboratories, of the classrooms. I fear giving everything my all like before. Whenever my eyes land on a passage that I cannot follow, I feel more exhausted than ever.'
'I can't help but wonder if the time I have here is enough to learn all that I want to know.'
'What if I exhaust all the knowledge here—like draining dry the Siestan sea—and I still cannot find my answer?'
'What should I do?'
—A discarded letter folded neatly into thirds at the bottom of the rubbish bin.

'Hot Sami-style cinnamon drinks, available only during the holidays! Great for the whole family! Buy two family meals and get one free, plus a chance to draw a special Christmas Messenger surprise toy...'
attributes.name: Shop PA

attributes.content: 'The latest styles in the Icefield Messenger series are now in stores! Bringing warmth to your whole family...'
attributes.name: Shop PA

attributes.content: The Christmas sales have already begun? Things are always so lively in the commercial district this time of year.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I don't think I've been to 'Miss Jacqueline's Tea Room' since Schwarz left. Sorry, Miss Jacqueline, but your towers of food are too much for me alone.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The Roxy Department Store is just around the corner, but after visiting it with Schwarz so many times I doubt I could surprise her with any gift I purchase there.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: And over there, I should be able to hire an international Messenger directly. The lines are much longer than elsewhere, but I can send out my letter and Christmas cards there. After I buy them, of course.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Hm, I suppose I don't have to write anything on greeting card to Father.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Oh, Rinz! Good afternoon!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Huh? Eh? Good afternoon, Ceylon. Didn't expect to—
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: (Quietly) Why is she here? What a pain.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No, I was just going to say, uh... I didn't expect you to remember my name.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Hm? Do I look like I have such a bad memory? How could I forget when you're the one who taught me to tell Victorian coins apart when we first started university?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Though, aside from payphones and the old vending machines in the hallways, I have to say I haven't found much of an opportunity to use them.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The vending machine was made to accept old coins, but I was trying to use the new ones and it jammed. We only managed to get it fixed because you gave it a good smack.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: And then there was the first Thursday Poetry and Tea Party. You were the one who reminded me not to read Williams first because of how famous he is.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'm not very interested in literature, sorry.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Then I guess you probably remember your report on our last field expedition. The one that included so much detail that it made everyone else on the team look like we didn't contribute anything. Gave us all dreadful marks.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Nothing. I'm just saying that I didn't really doubt your memory.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Are you here to shop too?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Yes. Christmas is almost here, so I thought I would buy some presents.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Oh, but this is perfect. You're a local. Would you mind coming shopping with me?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I've been in Victoria for years now, but I normally only visit the large department stores. I'm not very familiar with the small boutiques hidden in the alleys.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Er... me?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Sorry, were you busy with something else?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Right, we do have a few interim reports to write before the Christmas holidays. I'd understand if you aren't in the mood for shopping.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No, no. I'm already half done with my reports.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Please, you're not the only one who does their homework before it's due.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Though, when it comes to experiments, we never have enough time, do we?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: So what kind of gifts are you looking for? If you really don't want to waste time, we'd better be quick about it.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I don't mind if we take our time window shopping. I need a lot of gifts. We can buy whatever catches our eyes and strikes our fancy. That's how shopping should be.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Huh? I, uh, didn't expect you to have the leisure to stroll around and shop.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I simply feel I need a break today, and Christmas just happens to be the perfect excuse.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: ...Way to kill the holiday spirit for everyone else.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Never mind. There's a handmade chocolate shop down these steps. Let's start there.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: It has twenty kinds of completely different gift boxes, so you can buy all of them and give them out to different people. That ought to simplify your shopping.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Are you listening, Ceylon? Where has your mind drifted off to this time?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Oh, sorry.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: You seem rather strange today.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Ladies, would you like to give our new Christmas flavors a try? We have all kinds of gift boxes on sale.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Thanks. We were just about to take a look at some chocolates. Please, tell us more.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Hm... This sample is exquisite! Which flavor would this be?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Raspberry chunks with white chocolate. We have a snowfield-patterned Christmas gift box available, too.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Rinz, look! The packaging is just the color of Viviane's hair! Let's get her this.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Hm... hm?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: —Did you just say you're buying Viviane a gift?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: That's right. Are you thinking chocolates are too mundane?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No, I'm thinking you two had a row just the other day.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Oh, you mean the argument we had when we discussed Professor Diana's core theories during class? I already apologized to her yesterday.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The professor's Originium experiments already have applications for civilian use, at least according to her 'Originium, Separator, and the Trembling Land' booklet, but I hadn't read it yet.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I mean, it wasn't just the once. You two are at each other's throats every time we meet up as a group.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I took you for mortal enemies.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Is that so? But she's helped me learn me so many new things. I can never thank her enough.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: There is so little that we can know on our own. To get closer to the truth, we must find those with different viewpoints and share our perspectives.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Oh, you...
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: That is probably the main reason I left my hometown to come study in Victoria.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: In Siesta, everyone says that the Infected will never be cured. So I decided to leave and see if people from different places and different times had different answers.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Would ancient Victoria know more than young Siesta?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Perhaps.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: —Huh? Wait. Infected? Ceylon, you want to cure the Infected?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: That's right. Do you think that's too far-fetched?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No wonder you chose to take the pharmaceutical college's courses as an elective, and even put your statement right in the dean's mailbox. It caused quite a ruckus.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: The National University's pharmaceutical college is known to be particularly strict. Even if they do accept you as an audit student, they most likely won't give you any certifications.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I'm not interested in the certificates, I just—
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: —Oh, miss? Hello. Could you help me pick two chocolate gift boxes and ring them up? Thank you.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Of course. Right this way.
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: *Sigh*... In the end, I never got a chance to chase her away. I even listened to her talk my ear off.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Maybe I should slip away now. If I stay with her any longer, I won't finish what I came here for today.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: All ready now. Where should we go next?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: ...Perfect timing, as always.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Right, just so you know, I'm not going to buy your present today. I'm only shopping for everyone else's.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Huh? You were going to get me a gift? Is our relationship really—
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: (Quietly) *Sigh* If you knew what I've done, I'm sure you wouldn't think of me as a friend.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: After all, how could it be a surprise if I bought it right in front of you?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: *Cough*... *cough*! Er, right. That's true.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Okay, please lead the way. Let's head to the next shop.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Hmm... I still haven't yet picked the most important gift, but I don't need to settle on one today. Something so important deserves some careful thought.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Aside from that, all that's left is a greeting card. Once that's done, I'll hire an international Messenger, and my mission for the day will be over.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: More international post? You send letters home way too frequently. All those Messengers don't come cheap. Besides, won't you be heading home soon?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: It'll take many days for me to arrive. And I think it's better to send cards than to hand them over in person.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: That reminds me. How come you haven't bought anything yourself? Have I been getting in the way of your plans? If there are any shops you want to visit, you could bring me along.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: It's almost dark. If we take any longer, they'll all be closed.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: *Sigh* Fine... Such is my fate.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I want to check out the homeware shop over there. If you aren't interested, you don't have to wait for me.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Homeware? I am very interested!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: (Quietly) ...I'd rather you weren't.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Hello, my name is Rinz. I placed an order at your shop yesterday. This is the order code.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Oh, right. Could you wrap it for me, please? This is a gift for someone else.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Absolutely. Here's the item you ordered. Please take a look. Would you like to include a Christmas card?
attributes.name: Shopkeeper

attributes.content: No, no thanks.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: What did you buy?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: An automatic teapot. You just need to follow the instructions and put in some water and teabags. It'll keep the water at the right temperature and always make the best possible cup of tea.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I've heard about those! Hm, I wonder what kind of Arts Unit is behind that process? Would it be okay if I opened it up to read the instructions?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Just take it and do your research. No need to give it back, either.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Huh? I thought you were buying it as a gift?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: It's for you.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: You can laugh all you want. I didn't expect such a coincidence either.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Pff.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'd be really happy if you made your tea with this instead of by hand when you have afternoon tea with our classmates from now on. I'm sure they'll be too.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: But Christmas is still a month away, and our holidays start in two weeks.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: This isn't a Christmas present. It's an apology gift.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Please don't look at me so confused. It'll only zap what little courage I mustered to do this.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I was scared to talk to you before.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Er, actually, it isn't just me. Everyone is a little scared of you.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Huh? Why would you be scared of me? ...Is it because I want to cure the Infected?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No, no, of course not! I didn't even know that until you mentioned it today! I just thought that you put in way too much work!
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: You come from a scorching hot city, but you climb out of bed at six to snatch yourself a seat at the library in the dead of winter! It's almost terrifying how self-disciplined you are!
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Remember how we ran into each other in the hallway at ten this morning? I was heading to the canteen for breakfast, and you had a stack of books in your arms. When we greeted each other, I felt like your eyes were saying 'who would wake up at this hour?'
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Anyway, your eyes are like an ice-cold mirror. Whenever I see you, I see just how lazy I am reflected back at me.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Do I really seem so cold?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: D-Don't get the wrong idea! It's a compliment.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: —Right, is it fine if I ask you a question?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Are you perhaps really close friends with an Infected?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Eh?!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: ...Yes, I am. She's really dear to me.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Is she well?
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Her condition has been very stable. Nothing can bring her down. Not even Oripathy.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: That's good to hear.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Also, she's not in Victoria, so... the regulations here don't apply to her. If you want to—
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: No, no. I mean no ill will, and I don't think it's bizarre or anything.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: We're Originium researchers. Any of us could one day become infected because of an accident during an experiment or observation. Perhaps even deliberately.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: We know what it is, or at least we're closer to knowing than most.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Thank you, Rinz.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: *Sigh*. I should be the one thanking you.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Just like you have a dream to cure Oripathy, which led you to come all the way to the Victorian National University, even I have a tiny dream of my own.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: I know that all scholars dream of accomplishing what's never been done. I know we'll have to walk this road to the end before forging a new path forward on our own, but... I'm not ready for it yet.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Accomplishing what's never been done...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: —Fortunately, I have a fine role model like you around me.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Is that so? Can... Can I really become someone like that?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Just take the compliment. And don't give me that look.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: No, please pay it no mind. I just thought of something else... I think I finally realized something.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Oh, and I must insist on returning your gift. We simply didn't know each other well enough. That's nothing to apologize for.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Uh, about that, I hadn't got to the important part yet.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Actually, the reason I wanted to apologize is that I was too scared of talking to you to tell you that the Originium sample we collected from the Catastrophe ground zero had a rare reaction.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'm not too confident in my own experimental methods and observations. I kept thinking that maybe it was nothing special and I just didn't recognize it.
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: But it'd be so embarrassing to ask you to take a look and have you tell me that to my face!
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Which is why, even though I knew you would be more interested in its progress than any of us, I didn't dare to tell you—
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: We need to run! It's only three minutes until the next bus back to the university!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: As long as we can sneak inside the laboratory before it closes for the day, we can stay there overnight!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Er, isn't that against the rules? S-Slow down! You're going to rip my arm off!
attributes.name: Rinz

attributes.content: Master, a letter from Lady Ceylon.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Hm? This one sure took its time to arrive. You were just about to head there to escort her back.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Let me guess: she didn't mention me at all. As always.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Although she has already memorized its entire contents by heart, Schwarz subconsciously looks down at the letter again.

attributes.text: 'Since winter began, there has been a fireplace in the library that seems to run on Originium Arts. It's very pleasant to read books there now. My checkout records for this term have gotten so, so long.'

'Ever since I got to know my classmates better, I have gotten a lot of help from them too. Before, I never thought too deeply about it while searching for a cure to Oripathy, but everything that perplexed me has been resolved now.'
'Indeed, I realized how to break the code of Oripathy. Trust me, I will get there very soon.'
'I have attached a card for Father. Please hand it to him.'

attributes.content: Aside from the letter, the envelope is empty. The international Messenger's postmark states that this letter was posted three days after it was signed off.
(Lady Ceylon must have been fascinated by something else and forgot about the letter.)
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: No, Master. She wished you a happy holiday and said she is looking forward to joining you at the dining table on Christmas.
attributes.name: Schwarz
